DOC.brief_summary: -To compare single dose bioavailability Kali BTG
DOC.brief_title: Bioavailability Study Oxandrolone Tablets Under Fasting Conditions
DOC.detailed_description: -To compare bioavailability Oxandrolone 10mg tablet OXANDRIN 10mg tablet follow single -dose healthy , adult subject fast condition .
DOC.criteria: Healthy subject least 18 year age , may male may female unable bear child . Each subject shall give general physical examination within 28days initiation study . At end study , subject exit evaluation consist interim history , global evaluation , clinical laboratory measurement . Each female subject give serum test part pregnancy study screen process . Clinical laboratory measurement include Hematology , Clinical Chemistry , Urine Analysis , HIV Screen , hepatitisB , C screen Drugs abuse Screen Subjects history alcoholism drug addiction ( past 2 year ) , serious gastrointestinal , renal hepatic cardiovascular disease , tuberculosis , epilepsy . asthma , diabetes , psychosis glaucoma eligible thsi study . Subjects history breast prostate cancer eligible participate study . Subjects history allergic response class drug test exclude study . Subjects find urine/saliva concentration test drug allow participate . Subjects take investigational drug within thirty day prior first dose study allow participate . Female subject able bear child allow participate . Female subject positive inconclusive result withdrawn study .
